parts: When you come in here, she doesn't know about what me and you talked about. So, you have to act like I didn't tell you anything. So whatever she says, Oh, I want you to clean the garage. I don't know if she's going to tell you $2,000. I don't know if she's going to tell you $3,000. But you have to negotiate like you're negotiating for yourself. But look, I know that she wants to get rid of the car. And it's been sitting there for 20 years. And I know I want to get rid of the car. I wanted to give it to you for free. But now she's making a big deal out of it when before she told me to get rid of it. You understand? So, when you come in here, you talk to her. You say, look, I see the car. I know what it is. I know it needs work. I'm going to take care of it. You see, my mother-in-law is very emotional. And this car was my father-in-law's. My father-in-law, he died suddenly. You know, he had a heart attack and he died. So every time my mother-in-law thinks about my father-in-law, she gets very emotional. She doesn't want to throw things away. So this thing is like the last thing that she has from him. So that's why she doesn't want to get rid of it because she has this emotional attachment. But I need this fucking thing out of my life. And I'm trying to explain to her that she needs to park her car in the garage. We need to get all the garbage out of the garage. And Juan, he can help us. So that's what I'm trying to make you understand. So about the money, she told me $2,000. So she's going to tell you $2,000. So you have to act like you're going to pay her $2,000. But if you negotiate less, that means I have to pay you less. So you're doing me a favor. So negotiate like you're buying the car. Like you're buying the car. And then whatever you come to, but make the deal because I want this fucking thing gone. But you have to act like you don't know nothing about what me and you talked about. So if she doesn't move from the $2,000, then say okay, no problem. Fine, $2,000. And then tell her, okay, I'm coming. On Friday, I help you move all this stuff. We take the car and I help you clean the garage. And whatever else she says, I don't know what else she's going to say. Shes a nice lady but she’s emotional about this car

Cuando llegues aquí, ella no sabe nada de lo que tú y yo hablamos. Así que tienes que actuar como si yo no te hubiera dicho nada. Entonces, lo que sea que te diga, por ejemplo: "Quiero que limpies el garaje". No sé si te va a decir $2,000 o $3,000. Pero tienes que negociar como si estuvieras negociando por ti mismo. Mira, yo sé que ella quiere deshacerse del carro. Ha estado ahí sentado por 20 años. Y yo también quiero deshacerme del carro. Yo te lo quería dar gratis, pero ahora ella está haciendo un gran problema con esto, cuando antes me decía que me deshiciera de él. ¿Entiendes? 

Entonces, cuando hables con ella, dile: "Mire, yo veo el carro. Sé lo que es. Sé que necesita trabajo. Me voy a encargar de él". Mira, mi suegra es muy emocional. Este carro era de mi suegro. Mi suegro murió de repente, tuvo un ataque al corazón y falleció. Entonces, cada vez que mi suegra piensa en él, se pone muy emocional. No quiere deshacerse de las cosas. Y este carro es como lo último que tiene de él. Por eso no quiere dejarlo ir, porque tiene un apego emocional. Pero yo necesito sacar esta maldita cosa de mi vida. Estoy tratando de explicarle que necesita estacionar su carro en el garaje. Tenemos que sacar toda la basura del garaje, y Juan, tú puedes ayudarnos. 

Así que eso es lo que quiero que entiendas. Sobre el dinero, ella me dijo $2,000. Así que te va a decir $2,000. Actúa como si estuvieras dispuesto a pagar los $2,000. Pero si logras negociar menos, significa que yo te tengo que pagar menos. Me estás haciendo un favor. Así que negocia como si estuvieras comprando el carro. Lo que sea que acuerdes, cierra el trato porque quiero que esta maldita cosa se vaya. Pero tienes que actuar como si no supieras nada de lo que tú y yo hablamos. Y si ella no baja de los $2,000, entonces di: "Está bien, no hay problema, $2,000". Luego dile: "Ok, el viernes vengo, te ayudo a mover todo, nos llevamos el carro, y te ayudo a limpiar el garaje". Y lo que sea que ella diga, no sé qué más va a decir. Es buena persona, pero es muy emocional con este carro.
